4. Now, Person 1 does disco and Person 3 does rock-climbing. Since Person 1 is not Person 3, Person 1 must be in position 1 or 2. But from rule 2, Person 1 cannot be in position 1 (as Person 1 does disco and Person 3 does rock-climbing, violating rule 3). So, Person 1 is in position 2.

5. Now, Person 2 does disco and Person 3 does rock-climbing. From rule 5, Person 1 (who does disco) cannot be the designer. So, Person 1 must be the journalist or the fan rock. But from rule 6, Person 2 (who drinks soy-milk) and the fan rock have different parity positions. Since Person 2 does disco, the fan rock must be in position 1 (as the only other position for the fan rock would be position 3, but that would make Person 1 the fan rock, violating rule 6). So, Person 1 is the fan rock.

6. Now, Person 1 is the fan rock, Person 2 is the journalist or the fan rock, and Person 3 is doing rock-climbing. But from rule 6, Person 2 (who drinks soy-milk) and the fan rock have different parity positions. So, Person 2 must be the journalist.

7. Now, Person 1 is the fan rock, Person 2 is the journalist, and Person 3 is doing rock-climbing. From rule 7, Person 3 (who does rock-climbing) is either the doctor or the fan disco. But from rule 8, the doctor and the fan disco have different parity positions. Since Person 3 does rock-climbing, the doctor must be in position 1 (as the only other position for the doctor would be position 3, but that would make Person 3 the doctor, violating rule 7). So, the doctor is the fan disco.

8. Now, Person 1 is the fan rock, Person 2 is the journalist, and Person 3 is the doctor (who is also the fan disco). Since Person 1 is the fan rock, Person 1 drinks mirinda (as the only other beverage left for Person 1 is coffee, but that would violate rule 4). So, Person 1 drinks mirinda.

9. Now, Person 1 drinks mirinda, Person 2 is the journalist, and Person 3 is the doctor (who is also the fan disco). From rule 4, Person 1 (who drinks mirinda) is to the right of Person 2 (who drinks soy-milk). So, Person 2 drinks coffee.

10. Now, Person 1 drinks mirinda, Person 2 drinks coffee, and Person 3 is the doctor (who is also the fan disco). From rule 9, Person 3 (who is the doctor) is to the left of the designer. But we already know that Person 3 is the doctor, so the designer must be in position 1.
